TopicTitle: I need your (very fake) investment of (again, very fake) money to kickstart my RSS career mode!

Articles.Content:
The Kerbal E-konemy is in ruins

they've disregarded any ideas for a space program. 

I don't have the funds to start this grand-ish RSS Modded Career mode... 

not really, I just can think of what to set the starting funds to XD

**But you do!**

 **** 

Pretend you actually care about your funds before casting your money into the bucket. 

- The lowest you can donate is 50f (50 Funds).
- The most you can donate is 100k f (100,000 Funds)

Ã¢â‚¬â€¹

Thanks for your co-operation! If you donate to the Space Program, you will be forever remembered as that guy who's credit card details were given to the wrong group of Kerbals XD

If you donate, say how much you donated below.

**What are the goals of this space program?**

- We hope to land on the Mun, then put a base on it.
- We hope to reach Mars within 5 years, and land Kerbals on it within 20
- put a rover/probe on Venus within 7 years
- Deploy multiple Satalites around Jupiter and take a few pictures
- Put the first Kerbals around Jupiter within 50 Years
- You've got the money. What do you want? Will I document the projects and take pictures?

I haven't thought of a name for the program yet. Do give ideas though. 

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-08T17:35:56Z" title="05/08/2015 05:35  PM" data-short="9 yr">May 8, 2015</time> by One-Way Films**

50 funds for you, I'm bankrupt here too!

 - Sam

You should at least explain the ideas you have. I can't donate money on something as vague as "the space program".

So, what do you plan to do? Which places are you going to visit? How that would benefit the Kerbanity?
I'm a kerbal millionaire, take 100,000 funds.

Well, you'll need to do better than that to have one commit their funds to this...

Have you made any plans? What are your proposed timeline?

Do you have a base of operations or should we fund the construction of a space center?

What is your goal?

Have you hired or are already looking for personnel? Engineers, Scientists, Pilots..

Will you prospect possible mining goods for resale?

What do we get for our money?

Can you send my son to space?

Can you send my mother-in-law to space? And leave her there?

![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

I could spare 50.000 for a neighbouring spaceprogram!

Don't spend it all in one place you hear?!

I donate 1000 funds and will, in a moment, edit my persistence file to reflect this.

Space programs are great, but without more information, I can't give you more than that.

I will allocate 1k funds, so long as I get an eight-second product placement in each of your publications.

Whether or not your program serves Kerbanity, I think many Kerbals will be fascinated with watching, which opens up a new market for product placement.

"You just CAN think of what to set the starting funds too " ??????????????????????????

OK 238 Funds if you add the missing "T" to your OP.

![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)
Seeing nothing of value (yet?) I will not fund this. Same rules as I used for Star Citizen.
There we go. I added goals. Thanks for the investments everyone ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
I've donated 50k funds...I'm a rich kerbal, who isn't too bright...but its nice to see other things explode in the sky apart from my own.
My current Career save can spare $100,000. Good luck, fellow spacefarers!
50k for you and your program.

What is the ROI? How much fund can I expect to make per share? Is there some kind of media kits for investors that I can see?

Jk.

I will invest 100,000 fund. But I expect you to go to Duna to mine for ore and 10% of the profit!

I'll donate some in-flight snacks. Jeb spend the last of our corporate money on little Kerbals in grass skirts to place on the cockpit panel in front of the HUD. He says that watching the little suckers hula dance is good for morale, especially when the ground is coming up awful fast...

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-08T17:57:52Z" title="05/08/2015 05:57  PM" data-short="9 yr">May 8, 2015</time> by adsii1970**
  
Gave 100 for your cause plus the snacks...

> 
> Pretend you actually care about your funds before casting your money into the bucket.

Zero funds it is, then.
Maybe, but what do *I* get for it? Just warm fuzzies? Nah. Toss me some rep, at least. (In-game; I'm not begging for forum points. That's crass.)
my space program is currently very stable on financial side, so here is your 50k funds from me ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

I propose that anyone donating funds must go to their primary/legacy save, build an unmanned ship of equal or greater value and immediately crash it to "remove" those funds from their game, thus facilitating the "transfer".

As such, I can afford 50,000 funds at present and will "transfer" them later today. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Here, have ![Fund_char.png](http://wiki.kerbalspaceprogram.com/images/8/8a/Fund_char.png)60.000, so that you go to Venus.

pls document it

Also, this gave me an idea.

Wouldn't it be nice if we had a "transaction" thread? Like, where people can donate funds to other people, but in a realistic way (a.k.a. editing their saves aswell)?
This thread violates section 2.2j of our community rules, so I'm closing it ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
